sp.p:
Or, to return again to the past, take as another instance the ancient Greeks. Do you think that Greek
art ever tells us what the Greek
people are like? Do you believe that
the Athenian women were like the stately
dignified figures of the Parthenon
frieze, or like those marvellous
goddesses who sat in the triangular pediments of the same building? If you
judge from the art, they certainly were so.
